title: Introductory UCS Director REST API, Custom Tasks and Workflow Creation Part III
slug: The objective of this introductory UCS Director REST API learning lab is to create a custom task that contains JavaScript, use the custom task in a workflow and execute the workflow from the UCS Director interface and from Postman using a UCS Director REST API call.

related.title: Introductory UCS Director REST API Part I
Introductory UCS Director REST API Part II
